<TD VALIGN=TOP><TABLE BORDER><TD>
<IMG SRC="../graphics/arho1640.jpg"></TD></TABLE></TD><TD VALIGN=TOP ALIGN=CENTER width=300><FONT SIZE=3><B>Collections in Our Care<BR><BR>ARLINGTON HOUSE COLLECTION<BR>
<I>A Closer Look</I></B></CENTER>
<HR WIDTH=300>

<FONT SIZE=3><BR><B>ARHO1640: Chair</B><BR><BR>Chippendale, side; pierced and carved scrolled splat, cord and tassel, gadroon moulding at base of splat; shaped toprail with ascanthus leaves and shell; carved rolled side-scrolled ears, stop fluting on stiles; red damask slip seat; shaped seat rails, shells on front rail, cabriole forlegs, acanthus knees, ball and claw feet; plain legs and back feet.<BR><BR></FONT>
